alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 2:30PM EDT until July 26 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in south central Michigan... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cement City, or 10 miles southeast of Jackson, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grass Lake around 240 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Brooklyn, Oak Point, Sunset Beach, Michigan Center, Norvell, Leoni and Napoleon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
